title: Miser's Purse, early 19th century
description: Crocheted white silk ornamented with cut steel beads in variation of a hexagonal pattern; two faceted steel rings with raised ball pattern, control side opening.  Tasssels at either end of small and large faceted steel beads.

tombstone.epitaph:
Miser's Purse, early 19th century.
early 19th century. Medium: silk, steel
Technique: crocheted. Gift of Mrs. Albert Blum. 1953-106-104.
